mapper.select: SELECT INQUIRY_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, NICKNAME, INQUIRY_CREATED_DATE, user_id, INQUIRY_PUblIC, inquiry_response FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, INQUIRY_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, NICKNAME, INQUIRY_CREATED_DATE, user_id, inquiry_public, inquiry_response FROM ( SELECT I.INQUIRY_ID, I.INQUIRY_TITLE, CASE WHEN U.USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN U.USER_NICKNAME ELSE K.NAME END AS NICKNAME, I.INQUIRY_CREATED_DATE, i.user_id, i.inquiry_public, i.inquiry_response FROM GGHJ_INQUIRY I LEFT JOIN GGHJ_UNI UNI ON I.USER_ID = UNI.UNI_ID LEFT JOIN GGHJ_USER U ON UNI.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN GGHJ_KAKAO K ON UNI.KAKAO_ID = K.KAKAO_ID WHERE U.USER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR I.INQUIRY_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY I.INQUIRY_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{inquiryPage} * #{inquiryAmount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{inquiryPage} - 1) * #{inquiryAmount}
SELECT I.INQUIRY_ID, I.INQUIRY_TITLE, I.INQUIRY_CONTENT, I.INQUIRY_RESPONSE, I.INQUIRY_PUBLIC, I.USER_ID FROM GGHJ_INQUIRY I JOIN GGHJ_UNI U ON I.USER_ID = U.UNI_ID WHERE I.INQUIRY_ID = #{inquiryId}
